website_summaries.verdict: An affordable on-camera light with many of the same features as others, but requires some adjustment.
pros: Comes with 2 color filters to adjust the color temperature and 3 different battery adapters to accommodate different camera manufacturers: Panasonic, Nikon, and Canon
cons: Light has a green tint when used without a filter

customer_reviews.title: I have a Neweer Led light that looks better, i've made a comparison of color and you ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem. I tought this was a commom LED light, just ment to do the work. But, I don't know if its only my case, but the light it's in a strange green color. It's not white. And, since this model (168A) doesn't have a "color temperature wheel", I'll have to live with that green light from now on. I have a Neweer Led light that looks better, i've made a comparison of color and you can quickly tell that green led this Selens LED has. Package was fine, costumer service and shipping too. But... I'm dissapointed =/ (sorry about the picture quality, but anyway you do can see the color difference between both lights)
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy Video Light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light primarily because it has adapter plates for common Li-ion batteries such as the Canon LP-E6. Brightness is rather good, but there are two critical flaws. 1. The color balance is just terrible and the filter doesn't help. You will need to do a custom white balance or correct it in PP. Of course it will not mix well with other lights. 2. There is some weakness in the contacts or electronics that makes it flicker annoyingly at times. This may be a individual unit defect. The construction is very cheap as one might expect from the price.
customer_reviews.author: EB-58

customer_reviews.title: The brightness of this lamp is like staring into the sun lol
customer_reviews.text: The brightness of this lamp is like staring into the sun lol. I'm using two of these to light my streaming area that uses a green screen and the adjustable dial works wonders when the windows in my room go from day to night. An excellent option as well if you need a lamp for emergency situations as it does run on AA batteries. I used Duracell Ultras on it to test it out and it ran about 8 hours before it started dimming out. It's a great light for video or photographers needing good light.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light for the price ! BUT has a greenish tint ! MUST color correct in POST
customer_reviews.text: Nice light for the price . Color correction IS a MUST ... it has a "greenish" tint , and you MUST color correct the video . It's very practical as you can use AA or rechargble AA , or a Nikon or Canon Camera LioN battery (adapter plates includes ) Easily mounted on DSLR or rig or even on a monopod and give to someone else to hold closer to subject . My daughter even uses it last week to shoot an super 8mm film indoors .
customer_reviews.author: Serge A.

customer_reviews.title: It's a little bulky but for it's price it's perfect. Has hot-shoes on all four sides and the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bulky but for it's price it's perfect. Has hot-shoes on all four sides and the filters are decent if you need them. The throw is a little limited. Up-to 8' for good illumination and it just gives you "bright eyes" and hair highlights after 12'. The whole use-a-camera-battery-adapter thingies are kinda a joke. The batteries weigh 3x more than the light and cause it to tilt towards the back. Just go with re-chargeable AAs. The dimmer is fine. Again, for the price ... it's perfect. Not spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great, inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive lighting unit! I use it for product photography and videos. It can be battery powered by a variety of camera batteries (as well as AA's). My Canon Rebel battery didn't fit, but my Canon 6D battery did! The power adapter (sold separately) is expensive, but I was able to find an old power adapter that was the right voltage and polarity (9VDC center positive).
customer_reviews.author: Brian R Shim

customer_reviews.title: Bright but guzzles batteries
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple of these for my wife's makeup videos and they work really well. She has to use the lowest setting of brightness so she won't go blind but then again, she sits about 2 feet away from them. The biggest issue I have with them is how fast it drains batteries. Like not even a couple hours and it takes 6 AA batteries. I would highly recommend investing in rechargeable batteries for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Purbaugh

customer_reviews.title: This is hands down one of the best lights I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down one of the best lights I’ve ever purchased. It’s a great product for an amazing price. I highly recommend it. I did a night shoot just last week and the light was perfect and it didn’t get extremely overheated like some are known to.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Wymon

customer_reviews.title: Too much green tint for it to be useful
customer_reviews.text: Product is physically as described and the overall quality is in par with the other LED lights in the $25-35 price range. The problem is the LEDs are too green in their tint. You can place the orange filter/gel in front to try to balance the color a bit, however, you lose over half the light strength. Better to buy other lights with LEDs that have better spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: love kafa

customer_reviews.title: Dam good light for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall this light is great for both videos and photography it evenly lights your whole frame and reaches distances past 20ft. Super compatible with different rechargable battery's good for studio lighting with the D.C. Input (don't need batteries) I can also attach a shotgun mic to the cold shoe mounts on the sides. This product is great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nolan D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this light.  Really lights up my subjects and battery life is really good.
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I use it along with the Pro Series Professional Video Stabilizing handle. Mounts perfectly and really lights up my subjects. I love the adjustable lighting and battery status meter. Would certainly recommend to anyone trying to up their production game.
customer_reviews.author: KRowe

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great LED panel
customer_reviews.text: The light color is quite yellow compared to my other LED panels. The construction is good, the multiple battery adapters are very nice. The adapter for the EP6 (Canon) was a bit loose. If you were doing a run and gun the light might flicker on you. It did flicker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kent H

customer_reviews.title: as long as I use this light as main source of light and my camera can adjust the White Balance it fine. The good thing is this l
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, but the light is little greenish, as long as I use this light as main source of light and my camera can adjust the White Balance it fine. The good thing is this light can adjust the brightness and has adapters allow user to use camera battery to power it.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Works well on our DSLR cameras!
customer_reviews.text: Great light to add to our DSLR cameras. Strong, works well and is light enough to use during a long photo shoot. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: It's a very useful light. Just used for the first time on ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very useful light. Just used for the first time on set yesterday. The downside is that the lights is slightly green. But it can be fixed in post. For this price, I'm happy that it includes different plate for different kind of camera batteries and it's well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Yuhan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. Got this for use with still photos. Very green cast when used w/o the warming gel. The battery adapter that attaches to the back of the light is very flimsy and falls off constantly. Intermittent power on/off problems as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rice

customer_reviews.title: great for video or still fill lighting
customer_reviews.text: Dimmable, great for video or still fill lighting, comes with several camcorder battery adapters, and works with standard batteries. Has a "gas gauge" for battery life remaining. Comes with several filters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light!! For the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light!!!!!! It gives you a range of light that is perfict for action sports at night!!!! My setup needed a front light insert Selens 168 LED dimmable light the second photo is the outcome with no after effects just cropping. Tip: buy camera batteries for the adapter because it goes through AAs like a hungy teenager!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but has green tint.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very bright output, but it also has a green tint to the LEDs. I can't correct it with a gel so I have to do it in post on the desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart B.

customer_reviews.title: Has a green hue.
customer_reviews.text: The light is fairly bright but it has a green hue, which makes it almost impossible to use for videography or photography. It also doesn't always stay on when I turn it on. I have to fiddle with the adjustment knob for it to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Jagmohan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed- Cheap quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to shoot video and the base of the light broke within Three days. Cheap and nasty poorly made product. I had to purchase another one from somewhere else that was actually $8 cheaper and works way better. Has a metal base on it unlike this cheap plastic one. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a versatile light
customer_reviews.text: Not too many products are better than expected - this one is. Adjustable output, many choices for power (ou can use several different types of camera batteries, or even AAs). I plan to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Works well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and they have worked great. I have been using them for photographing small objects such as coins and watches and I am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Raya

customer_reviews.title: Powerful light!
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality led panel I was not expecting to be so bright! The ability to dim the light to get the exact setting you need makes this a must have for film makers!
customer_reviews.author: W.Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have to return it. Even wife can tell the light was weird. Yellow- greenish
customer_reviews.author: I. Bugarin

customer_reviews.title: Great light fo.r the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't beat this light. Do a lot of wedding photography so in dim lit areas I need lighting. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Fischer

customer_reviews.title: the light is pretty good, and pretty bright
customer_reviews.text: MAKE SHURE TO TIGHTEN LOCK FIRST!!! Other than the weak tripod/camera adapter, the light is pretty good, and pretty bright. Sadly it didn't have an adapter for my hdr battery.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Green tint to it. You can fix it in photoshop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great in crowds.
customer_reviews.text: Provides light as needed. Very satisfied with the quality of the product and the lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Les Ismore

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't throw light very far but you probably don't need it to in a video interview situation. Head's the light is a little green so adjust your color temperature accordingly
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chaiken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my photography arsenal.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Love the interchangeable plates and how amazing it enhances the light, the dim feature is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to filming so i'm still learning how to use light but from what I can tell this is a great tool. Light is super bright if you want it to be and the brightness can be adjusted. it also has mounting spots on every side so you can attach it at any angle or even attach multiple things to it.
customer_reviews.author: MrMileRunner

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for my granddaughter to use in digital photography. She is very pleased with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Alan W Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Don't even waste your money. It is not that bright. And what I received the package it was so bent. I can't even put the screen on. I was going to return it but my son ripped the packaging box. So waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Samsara L.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, if you are armature photographer and don't want to spend hundreds dollars for lights this is the best...
customer_reviews.author: JG (Highflyer)Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: A lot larger than I expected. No many options for mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Rivera, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: ... or hue to it - it just wasn't a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: This kept kicking off a weird green ting or hue to it - it just wasn't a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gladney

customer_reviews.title: Did not turn on
customer_reviews.text: I was mailed a defective led light. I have two fully charged LP-E6 batteries and it did not turn on. So I put in AA batteries but that still did not work. I am so disappointed because the reviews were so good. I was really looking forward to using this light my shoot next week.
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: I love this light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It came fast and on time. The light is ultra bright and works great for my videos.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I shot a music video with it and it came out nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Even the lowest light setting is very very hard to not squint at. Works well if you do not want someone looking your way. I shot a music video with it and it came out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Provides a lot of light for a great price. Was worried that it'd burn through batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: Provides a lot of light for a great price. Was worried that it'd burn through batteries but have gotten several hours out of the first set so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on these
customer_reviews.text: Battery are all lose in the slot and have to wedge in to work. Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Kosmo

customer_reviews.title: The best video light at a very cheap price
customer_reviews.text: The best video light at a very cheap price! You can't go wrong with this. Gets very bright, especially for shooting in pitch black settings. Don't read any further,,,,Just buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Lflat

customer_reviews.title: Price is good but the light looks kind of green
customer_reviews.text: Price is good but the light looks kind of green. As I am a video/photographer it makes it a bit difficult and annoying to adjust white balance too often
customer_reviews.author: francisco palacios

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive and professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this led bar for my gopro and dslr and the light works awesome at night super bright and I love how you can change the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy and keeps moving or falling off when tilted regardless how tight I screw it on
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kolba

customer_reviews.title: Green tint
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the other reviews. Has a strong green tint.... Can’t even use because of the green tint; returning.
customer_reviews.author: April York

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out how to use this. The color on the light is very strange.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Portable Light thus far
customer_reviews.text: The best portable light so far. Just throw a paper towel over it to diffuse and you are set.
customer_reviews.author: David Mc Rae

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! Comes with a few adapters that you can use other battery packs to provide power.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Marler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, many adapters included, very bright & soft light.
customer_reviews.author: Herc Driver

customer_reviews.title: Unique power options
customer_reviews.text: Battery adapters are a little wiggly in attachment so gaffers tape helps, but this actually accepts mainstream camera batteries like the one used for the Nikon D800/D7100.
customer_reviews.author: greg hopkins

customer_reviews.title: My unit gave poor color rendition
customer_reviews.text: I photograph hand-made jewelry. My light tent came with 5500K plug-in LED lights and give good color rendition. The Selens unit by comparison gives a decidedly green cast to my images, despite it supposedly also being poised at 5500K. My Olympus DSLR cannot completely adjust for it, and my photo editing software also gives only partial compensation. I'm sure if I spent the time tweaking the software the results would be better, but who wants to deal with that? Received today and returning right away.
customer_reviews.author: soil doc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light for photography
customer_reviews.text: Great light for photography. Took the below photo using the light and iPhone 7 plus dual portrait mode.
customer_reviews.author: Saul L.

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo satisfied. What an inexpensive buy valuable light to have! If you bought off brand rechargeable batteries (like my canon LP-E6's) retire them from the camera, buy official ones and use the off brand in this LED System. Great light!
customer_reviews.author: A Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the light! Nice and bright on a boat for bowfishing!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This light is great for lighting up subjects
customer_reviews.text: This light is great for lighting up subjects, but the hot shoe attachment is made out of plastic. The attachment it came with broke after a few uses. Im keeping it because its bright and handy. Would be better with a sturdier hot shoe attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not a white light; the color is yellow/green.
customer_reviews.author: Bizie Biz

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it and have used it for weddings and many ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is so worth it for the money. So far I love it and have used it for weddings and many video projects on my Panasonic GH3 The dimming feature is very cool and handy. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: this light is the best, to many flimsy lights out there, but this light is perfect, you have 3 ways to charge, your camera battery, (make sure its is comparable)regular battery, and also you can connect it directly to your camera(must buy correct wire) Solid light the material is plastic but NOT flimsy at all, its bright and it has a dimmer, not cheaply made at all, the hotshoe is solid, you will feel the quality,
customer_reviews.author: A.L designs

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I used this at the last wedding I filmed. it worked out great because the venue was dark and if i did not have this light i would have been in trouble. i really like the filter it comes with it gives off a nice color tone i think with out it the light is a little harsh. I love how you can use so many different batteries I just ended up using AA batteries and they lasted all night! overall i would definitely get this if you are on a budget and don't want to spend hundreds on a light.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn Hatton

customer_reviews.title: ... from no power supply or battery this light is great. For the money it's quite powerful
customer_reviews.text: Aside from no power supply or battery this light is great. For the money it's quite powerful. Easy to set up, easy to pack up.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: go for it
customer_reviews.text: i didn't really use it till now, but as a test its very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sabbah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lights are really powerful and very easy to attach to my tripod!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect lighting if your on a budget, provides great lighting for any situation
customer_reviews.author: WLVisuals

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, must keep at least 1 light in your bag...
customer_reviews.text: I use this light pretty much all the time. It's so bright I have to bounce the light to give subjects a nice fill. I like natural looking light and this one's a pretty good option. The diffuser really helps to soften and spread the light out a bit. I've used an extra layer or tissue paper to give it more diffusion. Defiantly recommend this light to anyone concerned about flickering. I just keep it full blast-there's no flicker. And if it's too much, just pull the light back...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tan Productions

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No problems. Light produces good skin tones in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good video light
customer_reviews.text: Light is very bright, it is dimmable an also you can apply filters, one is yellow and another is white. Light works on different kinds of battery Like NP-550,LP-E6,EN-EL15 and on 6 pcs AA. Overall I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Oldmax

product_meta.title: Selens 168 LED Dimmable Ultra High Power Panel Digital Camera/Camcorder Video Light, LED Light for Canon, Nikon, Pentax, Panasonic,Sony, Samsung and Olympus Digital SLR Cameras
feature_bullets: Dimmable Lighting Intensity -- Rotate Switch for on/off And Brightness Adjustment.
Color Temperature Adjustable -- You can change the Color Temperature by use the filter which come with LED-168.
Support Multiple installation -- Support single or multiple installation to adjust output.
General Hot Shoe Mount -- Fit to Most of the Camera brand like Canon,Nikon,Pentax...
Compatible with five different kinds of battery Like NP-550,LP-E6,EN-EL15,AA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
